discmania.store
Class User

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--discmania.store.User
public class User
extends java.lang.Object

A user of the webstore. Can be a customer or an employee.

Version:
$Id: User.java,v 1.1 2002/12/04 13:06:31 foo Exp $
Author:
